TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SelectionPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示控制項，該控制項可作為可選取之子項目集合的容器。

span.span: Represents a control that acts as a container for a collection of selectable child items.
The children of this element support the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請參閱[UI 自動化用戶端的控制項模式對應](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md)如需範例，可能會實作此控制項模式的控制項。See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that may implement this control pattern.

summary.span: 取得這個 的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含控制項模式的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的屬性值必須已先前曾要求使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用取得屬性的目前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 要求的屬性不在快取中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CanSelectMultipleProperty As AutomationProperty

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，根項目傳遞給函式傳回的集合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]根的子代且符合一組屬性條件的項目。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIASelectionPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

summary.span: 取得這個 的目前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含控制項模式的目前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必須從與參考，以取得目前的值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果使用取得、 它只快取資料，包含，並嘗試取得任何屬性的目前值引發例外狀況。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用取得先前使用指定之屬性的快取的值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent InvalidatedEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly InvalidatedEvent As AutomationEvent

summary.span: 識別下列情況引發的事件：容器內的選取範圍有重大變更，需要傳送的加入及移除事件數量超過 常數允許的數目。

span.span: Identifies the event that is raised when a selection in a container has changed significantly and requires sending more addition and removal events than the constant permits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當容器中的選項大幅變更，需要傳送比更多新增和移除事件時引發的失效的事件常數所允許。An invalidated event is raised when a selection in a container has changed significantly and requires sending more addition and removal events than the constant permits. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，宣告的事件接聽程式。In the following example, an event listener is declared for the . [!code-csharp[UIASelectionPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

summary.span: 識別可從容器中取得所選項目的屬性。

span.span: Identifies the property that gets the selected items in a container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 這個屬性不存在於必須使用抓取或。This property is not present in and must be retrieved by using or . ## Examples 在下列範例中，集合會取得代表選取範圍容器中選取的項目。In the following example, a collection of s representing the selected items in a selection container is obtained.
